info.title: GraphManagementClient
info.description: The Microsoft Graph API provides a RESTful set of web services that interact with Microsoft Graph service to manage your entities and relationships across different services exposed with rich scenarios around users and groups (Azure Active Directory).

post.description: Create a GuestUser sending an invitation

parameters.name: invitationContent
parameters.description: The email address of the GuestUser you want to invite, the domain of the mail address must exist on existing Azure AD

201.description: Create successful. The operation returns the resulting GuestUser resource.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

inviteRedeemUrl.description: The invitation url for this GuestUser invitation

invitedUserDisplayName.description: The name of the GestUser invited

sendInvitationMessage.description: Set to true if there is a custom message in the invitation of the GuestUser

invitedUserMessageInfo.description: The custom message information for the GuestUser invited

status.description: The status of this GuestUser invitation

invitedUserEmailAddress.description: The email of the GuestUser invited

inviteRedirectUrl.description: The redirect url for this GuestUser invitation

messageLanguage.description: The language message of the message

address.description: The email address of the recipient
